name: Magic Custom Tokens
description: Create custom tokens for Magic: The Gathering as digital tokens.  With magic custom tokens you can:   Create a token from scratch, setting the token s power/thoughness, skill, color and name   Use customized pixel art tokens as your own fun tokens   Count up to 36 tokens simuntanneosly on the board   Control tap, untapping, board wipe and attackers declaration   Unlock more brand new pixel art tokens with time   Customize interface color, appearance and card size on the screen   Use some of Magic the gathering original tokens (temporary function)   Use any pics to create your magic custom token (photo from cellphone)
